text: Nature's music is never over her silences are pauses, not conclusions.
author: Mary Webb

text: In essence, String Theory describes space and time, matter and energy, gravity and light, indeed all of God's creation... as music.
author: Roy H. Williams

text: There is still a future with music, because people want music.
author: Maynard James Keenan

text: People who make music together cannot be enemies, at least while the music lasts.
author: Paul Hindemith

text: I haven't heard any music on the BBC World Service in a long time. Maybe I'm listening at the wrong times. But not one single piece of music.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi
